actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subsection (e) of the act of August 25,1958 (Public Law 85-745, 72 Stat. 838), as amended, to provide that the widow of each former President shall receive an annual monetary allowance that is equal to 55 percent of the annual allowance authorized for former Presidents.

summary.text: Provides that the widow of each former President shall receive an annual monetary allowance that is equal to 55 percent (formerly $20,000 per year) of the annual allowance authorized for former Presidents.

titles.title: A bill to amend subsection (e) of the act of August 25,1958 (Public Law 85-745, 72 Stat. 838), as amended, to provide that the widow of each former President shall receive an annual monetary allowance that is equal to 55 percent of the annual allowance authorized for former Presidents.
